text: Acoran Juan Hernandez Mendoza (born in Tenerife) is a Spanish male weightlifter, competing in the 62 kg category and representing Spain at international competitions. He competed at world championships, most recently at the 2011 World Weightlifting Championships. ==Major results== {|class = "wikitable" style="text-align:center;" ! rowspan=2 width=40|Year ! rowspan=2 width=250|Venue ! rowspan=2 width=60|Weight !colspan=4| Snatch (kg) !colspan=4| Clean & Jerk (kg) !rowspan=2 width=40| Total !rowspan=2 width=40| Rank |- ! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank!! width=40|1!! width=40|2!! width=40|3!! width=40|Rank |- ! colspan=13|World Championships |- |2011 || align=left| Paris, France|| 62 kg ||111||116||118||23||135||140|| ~~144~~ ||30||258||28 |- |2010 || align=left| Antalya, Turkey || 62 kg ||111|| ~~116~~ || ~~116~~ ||25||132|| ~~137~~ || ~~137~~ ||30||243||26 |- |2009 || align=left| Goyang, South Korea || 62 kg ||115||120||123||19|| ~~135~~ ||135|| ~~141~~ ||28||258||26 |} ==See also== * Spanish records in Olympic weightlifting * 2011 World Weightlifting Championships – Men's 62 kg ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Spanish male weightlifters Category:Place of birth missing (living people) Category:People from Tenerife
